title: I just played an Aram game where I was the ONLY player.
body:
9 other bots.

If you don't know, leveling an account with ARAM or 3's is interesting because most of the time you're playing bots that are below difficulty of beginner bots...  Usually its one or 2 bots per team, and the trick is to farm them, and then worry about the actual players. I just played a game with 9 bots. I was literally the ONLY Player. 

Fun, but Riot... come on lol this has been going on forever... and I've never seen the company even mention the bot problem.

W/e free wins.

replies.body:
If there's a huge influx of bots, it probably means Riot is planning on cracking down on it soon.

I play TT and there were TONS of bots a few months ago, now it's pretty much bot-free. I think they kind of wait to massively banhammer tons of accounts so the people making them can't catch on to Riot's methodology.

Or at least, that's what I think I remember reading once, lol.
It's been happening for nearly a year, Riot doesn't care much about ARAM.

I havent noticed it on my main account. 

Only when Im leveling up alternates.

I think that is your ARAM ELO (because that is a thing)

It's the same with me. People complain about bots, but unless I suck so bad I can't recognize them, I never see them.

you recognize them by staying back. They are always going in.... They die and spawn to die again. There sole purpose in ARAM is use all abilities, die and respawn in ARAM. That's why those who are experienced at ARAM now use them as bait.

> [{quoted}](name=Slice n Dice em,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=01XXFKQI,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-21T02:03:59.583+0000)
>
> you recognize them by staying back. They are always going in.... They die and spawn to die again.

Sounds like some of my human teammates.

Much as I hate to say it, the actual solution is to "git gud", i.e. try to raise your ARAM MMR. It's a major crapshoot, especially with a randomized game mode, but your best bet would be to band together with at least two other human players and queue as a team repeatedly. Even if you only get crappy champ choices, the team coordination alone should let you reliably win enough games to advance to an MMR where bots stop appearing.
if you have higher than B5 ELO, you won't ever see them.

Untrue. I have a positive aram winrate, about 55% out of about 1500 games and I am gold 4 mmr in ranked. I frequently get put with and against plat players and there are still bots floating around here and there. Not many, but definitely noticeable.

Edit: My theory about it is that you could be plat solo queueing in aram and the enemy is gold silver premade, or premade with a pre-30 teammate and  to balance the mmr  difference it'll just shove a low elo and/or low level person on your team and expect you to carry (that's where the bots come from)
I have low silver ELO in ARAM, never seen a bot since I first started this game
I have literally never faced a bot in aram. I have only faced 2 in TT.  I have seen several in co-op though.

> [{quoted}](name=I Jungle to much,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=01XXFKQI,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-09-20T21:45:02.154+0000)
>
> I havent noticed it on my main account. 
> 
> Only when Im leveling up alternates.

Thats sadly the main issue. These botted accounts are really only for leveling up, so you only see them while leveling up. Once you hit 30, more often than not youll just find other level 30 accounts which mainly consist of ARAM-only player.
They're worse than new players they don't even use skills sometimes they'll just dive. The later at night I play the more bots I see.

I had a gangplank that did nothing but hit R and place barrels. He would never eat an orange, he would never shoot the barrels. I think I saw one or 2 q's. 

Enemy had a jhin that would ult, then cancel it without shooting.
My favorite are the poppys, they press R, power it up (helicopter mode) and then just let it expire.
They might have not updated Bot Poppy's programming since her rework; the bot might be trying to activate her old ult.

I've never seen bots in aram. I guess your aram elo must be very low to encounter them, I currently have over 35 wins compared to my losses, I usually see plats, golds, and even diamonds from time to time, but never a bot. If bots only show up in low elo that must be the reason why Riot continues to ignore the problem.

This is exactly what we said would happen if you got rid of dominion. It served as a method of bot control since no one really played it. Almost sad how when they announced it would be removed it suddenly became everyone's favorite game mode they claimed to always play.
So what your saying is we should kill off aram based accounts by forcing access to all champions in aram mode. Good idea.

That's not at all what he's saying and you know it. The problem is people using ARAM and co-op games to level up smurfs or accounts to sell. Changing the champion pool does absolutely 0 to fix the bot issue.
thats no excuse for not fixing another abuse case and one that can be easily corrected vs an ongoing problem they active target with mass bans.
send me a screen,  i think you lie
The exact same thing happened to me. It was the dumbest thing ever.

Yeah, levelling up a new account is horrible.
It's infested with bots.
Some are free wins but it's also really boring.

I have legit seen this for years now. Like I haven't seen it been fixed ever but I don't know how you do fix it. I don't even know how the script for the bot works really. I know Riot bans scripters in waves and I imagine it's the same with bots but I think bot accounts work on the computer rather than from the game and client. So trying to actually detect it and hit the root of the issue is just impossible.

It could be true, I'm sure it's less frustrating than bots in Dominion like "I Jungle to much (NA)" mentions but it's still a concern for new players. Why didn't they add it in that you can see if players are below level 30 during the draft? So you're not surprised when you see them without a keystone or with terrible rune pages.
This sounds more like a smurf problem

dont play arams at low levels
simplest and best solution
if you want to play for fun, play norms, if you are grinding play twisted treeline bots
trust me, its not worth the wait in that long a queue to play aram at low ranks
Free chests if you play on a smurf.
